description:
The Model 802 DeepWater is a precision voltage-output tiltmeter designed for underwater measurements and other applications under high pressure. The housing is machined from a solid piece of 316 stainless steel and incorporates a high-pressure neoprene connector (700 bars depth rating).

Inside are a gravity-referenced electrolytic tilt sensor and our low-noise electronics, delivering sensitivity, high dynamic range and long-term stability under the most demanding conditions. DeepWater tiltmeters are excellent choices for monitoring dams, oil platforms, pipelines and underwater machinery. DeepWater tiltmeters are also available with 4-20 mA and digital outputs.

classifier.name: Temperature coefficient
classifier.URI:
Scale factor: KS < 0.02%/ºC
Zero shift: KZ = ±0.0002
